resource.title: Handling Police Raids & Neighbor Diplomacy
resource.description: Crisis management guide covering de-escalation scripts, compliance folder preparation, and preventative neighbor diplomacy strategies.
resource.painPoint: Operating in "Gray Areas" where neighbors can weaponize noise complaints to call police on short-term rental hosts.
keyFeatures: "Proof of Compliance" folder preparation (having TM30s ready)
Strategies for "bribing neighbors with fruit" (preventative diplomacy)

specifics: Tourist police vs regular police guidance
